page.title: 18Traffic Survey at Elton
page.content: Children at Elton school carried out a survey of traffic at two locatians in the village between 11.00 and 11.30 am.on 9th July 1985.In Middle Street with traffic to houses & shops, the following movements were recorded. Towards the A605,6 cars,1 van,1 land- rover,2 pedestrians. Away from the A605,6 cars 1 van,1 lorry 1,landrover. At the same time, on the A605 towards Oundle we noted 28 lorries,2 buses,11 vans 77 cars 6 minibuses,2 caravans/ trailers and 3 pedestrians.On the A605 towards Peterborough there were 77 cars,no buses,24 vans,19 lorries, 1 minibus,2 caravans/trailers,1 motor cycle and 4 pedestrians. On a normal school day 9 members of class 3 walk to school,5 come by car and 14 come by bus from outside the village.
